game.name: Slide Soldiers
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A soldier on roller skates. A kingdom overrun with monsters. It’s a new twist on sliding block puzzles! It’s not about reaching the goal, just hitting the targets. Pick your targets and plan your moves cause there’s no stopping once you start!
